title: Preparation of cyclodextrin polymer-functionalized polyaniline/MXene composites for high-performance supercapacitor
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13685-13693
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02542C, Paper
Open Access

Tingting He, Xusen Li, Bingxin Sun, Liwei Lin, Fang Guo, Guowang Diao, Yuanzhe Piao, Wang Zhang
PANI was successfully grown in situ on the surface of MXene derived from CDP. The composite exhibited a good specific surface area and high specific capacitance.
